title: Track Fault on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 15 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 20 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE: Pls add 25mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 25 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi, due to a track fault at #JurongEast.Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 25 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi, due to a track fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE: Pls add 25 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 25 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is still available
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 20 mins travel time from #JooKoon towards #Clementi,due to a track fault at #JurongEast. Train svc is still available
[EWL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 10 mins travel time from #JooKoon to #Clementi towards #PasirRis. Train service is still available.
